title: Eagle's Destiny
description: Sizzling romance, dreams coming true, erotic moments? Well, at least that's what happens in Elizabeth's bestselling books. So far, her personal life is quite a bit different from the characters that she creates. Romance, in her life at least, is the last thing on her mind until she returns home to find she has a tempting new neighbor.Elizabeth's introduction to ruggedly handsome Michael is turning her life upside down. Written word is becoming the reality as he offers her the rare chance of the love she yearns for but never believes would be hers.Fate is a funny thing though. Obstacles of all sorts lay on this path to true love, but are some things just destined to be?
author: C.J. Corbin
